Constructor & Destructor Documentation

AV_Manager::AV_Manager (  ) 

Default constructor. Does not set 'do_av' bool, thereby disabling antirals.

AV_Manager::AV_Manager ( Population *  _pop  ) 

Constructor that sets the Population to which this AV_Manager is tied. This constructor also checks to see if the number of antivirals given in the params file greater than one and, if so, sets the 'do_av' bool.
